last_episode_to_air.name: Troll Exchange Program
last_episode_to_air.overview: King Trollex has invited one TrollsTopian to come back and live with the Techno Tribe.

name: Trolls: TrollsTopia
overview: Now that Poppy knows there are other musical trolls scattered throughout the forest, she bottles up her endless positivity and invites delegates from every troll tribe in the forest to live together in harmony in a grand experiment she calls TrollsTopia!

episodes.name: TrollsTopia Part 1
episodes.overview: Eager to befriend the new Trolls tribes, Poppy invites ambassadors to visit Trolls Village with the hopes that they can live in harmony in a brand new TrollsTopia! But as the Hard Rock Trolls prove to be a bigger challenge, Poppy must find a way to get everyone on the same page.

episodes.name: TrollsTopia Part 2
episodes.overview: Eager to befriend the new Trolls tribes, Poppy invites ambassadors to visit Trolls Village with the hopes that they can live in harmony in a brand new TrollsTopia! But as the Hard Rock Trolls prove to be a bigger challenge, Poppy must find a way to get everyone on the same page.

episodes.name: The Buddy System
episodes.overview: In order to quickly integrate all the Trolls into TrollsTopia, Poppy decides to have every new Troll live with a Pop Troll. But when personalities and customs clash, Poppy realizes that when it comes to TrollsTopia, it is best to go slow and steady.

episodes.name: Kick-Off Party
episodes.overview: When Poppy discovers that Val's idea of a kick-off party is extremely different to her own, she must find a way to plan an awesome party for TrollsTopia without stepping on Val's toes.

episodes.name: Bring It In
episodes.overview: When Poppy discovers that the Classical Trolls don’t ever hug, she sets out on a mission to teach them what hugging is all about. But once the Classical Trolls start hugging, Poppy and the Snack Pack have to shield the Classical Trolls from the awful truth: that their hugs are absolutely terrible.

episodes.name: Branch Out of Water
episodes.overview: When the Techno Trolls take over Branch's favorite hot springs and disrupt his morning routine, he has to go down to Techno Lagoon to reach an understanding with Synth, a Troll with whom he has nothing in common.

episodes.name: The Ballad of Holly Darlin'
episodes.overview: When Poppy receives a thank you note from Holly that is actually nicer than Poppy’s original gift, she heads to Country Corral to investigate. She learns that this is a common habit with Holly. She always shows her appreciation in big, big ways! Considering herself a pretty appreciative Troll in her own right, Poppy and Holly soon find themselves in an escalating war of generosity.

episodes.name: Across the Fashionverse
episodes.overview: Satin and Chenille awaken from a shared dream about a dress and decide to create this masterpiece. When they have trouble crafting the perfect sash, they turn to Rhythm & Blues for some funky science help and embark on a journey to a new fashion dimension.

episodes.name: Manager Poppy
episodes.overview: When Val’s manager must step down just before her first all-tribe concert, Poppy must learn the ways of the Hard Rock tribe to make sure Val’s ready for the show.

episodes.name: The Snug-a-lug Situation
episodes.overview: Lownote Jones recruits Branch, Val, Gus Tumbleweed and Laguna Tidepool to "petsit" his exotic pet snug-a-lug, the most adorable critter in the universe. But there's one rule that they must never break: you can't hug a snug-a-lug!

episodes.name: Girls Night
episodes.overview: After repeated invitations, Val reluctantly agrees to attend Poppy’s girls’ night. But can she get through the evening without letting her softer side show?

episodes.name: Cloud Control
episodes.overview: Branch discovers that he's not the only one in TrollsTopia who Cloud Guy annoys - there's someone from every Tribe except the Rock Trolls. Upon discovering that Val is the secret to avoiding Cloud Guy, Branch attempts to ward him off and help everyone live an annoyance-free life.

episodes.name: Classical Rock
episodes.overview: When Poppy discovers that Hard Rock Troll Demo has been sneaking to Classical Crest to play Classical Guitar, she promises to keep it a secret from Val.

episodes.name: Buckin' Branch
episodes.overview: The Country Trolls see something special in Branch, and invite him to a try-out for their rodeo. But when Branch struggles to keep up, he has to resort to increasingly desperate attempts to keep his "special" status, especially once the Country Trolls discover that Biggie is a rodeo savant.

episodes.name: Rhythm & the Blues
episodes.overview: When Rhythm & Blues find themselves feeling homesick and missing their friends back in Vibe Town, Poppy and the Trolls rally around them in support.

episodes.name: Mouth Guitar
episodes.overview: A new Rock Troll named Blaze Powerchord arrives in TrollsTopia with a talent for playing "mouth guitar" (pretending to play guitar by making noise with the mouth). When Blaze challenges Minuet Sonata to a mouth guitar contest, Val takes Minuet under her wing and teaches her to rock out with a pretend guitar.

episodes.name: Glitter Rush
episodes.overview: When a glitter shortage strikes TrollsTopia, Holly Darlin’ teaches everyone about mining for glitter! They strike a rich vein of the sparkly stuff, allowing the Trolls to indulge their wildest glitter fantasies.

episodes.name: Laguna Tidepool & the Lost Game Room
episodes.overview: Poppy and a team of Trolls follow Laguna Tidepool to an ancient temple filled with traps and obstacles on a search for the fabled greatest board game of all time.

episodes.name: Cheery Glo-mato
episodes.overview: After Val accidentally smashes Holly’s prized Cheery Glo-mato she must work with Poppy to get rid of her guilt by making things right with Holly.

episodes.name: Highly Amused
episodes.overview: When Dante comes down with a case of composer's block, he is unable to write any new music. That is, until he finds inspiration in the most unlikely place... Branch! Dante starts to shadow Branch's every move. As the invasion of privacy starts to wear on Branch, it becomes unclear what will reach its end first: Dante's symphony or Branch's patience.

episodes.name: The Makeunder
episodes.overview: Lownote Jones is so cool, he’s always the center of attention at every occasion. But Guy Diamond’s birthday party is coming up and it’s important to Lownote that Guy get all the attention on his special day. So he recruits Branch to give him a make-under, and teach him how to blend in at a party.

episodes.name: Smidge in the Saddle
episodes.overview: Back in Lonesome Flats, Gust Tumbleweed was the Fun Sheriff, serving and protecting fun wherever he went. When he offers his services to TrollsTopia, Smidge decides to tag along, determined to be the perfect partner.

episodes.name: Extra Tootering
episodes.overview: When Tiny Diamond confesses that he has yet to glitter fart, Guy and the others rally around him, determined to help him achieve his first shimmering toot!

episodes.name: The Last Scrapbook
episodes.overview: When Poppy and Val discover that they're both fans of the same scrapbook series, they join forces to try and track down the author.

episodes.name: Darlin 'Dos
episodes.overview: When Holly Darlin’ gives Poppy a BIG hair style, Poppy doesn’t want to hurt Holly’s feelings by admitting that her hair is just too big.

episodes.name: Bad Hair Day
episodes.overview: Val's best friend arrives in TrollsTopia for the big concert. But when she tries to talk Val into coming back to Rock Hollow, it's up to Poppy to show Val just how much TrollsTopia needs her.

episodes.name: Cakes on a Train
episodes.overview: When a train's brakes fail, Poppy and Branch to do everything in their power to save a magnificent Perfection Cake.

episodes.name: It's Dad-urday
episodes.overview: Guy and Tiny Diamond celebrate Dad-urday, but some traditional activities fall outside of Guy's comfort zone.

episodes.name: Smooth Operator
episodes.overview: Feeling guilty that she accidentally excluded a Troll from TrollsTopia, Poppy goes above and beyond to make Chaz, the Smooth Jazz Troll, feel at home.

episodes.name: Funtography Day
episodes.overview: Everyone is excited for picture day in TrollsTopia except for Minuet Sonata.

episodes.name: Hopscotch Extreme
episodes.overview: When Val is celebrated as the greatest Troll ever at Hopscotch Extreme, she shares with Poppy that her record-breaking hopscotch run was a fluke.

episodes.name: The Funk Wash
episodes.overview: Smidge accidentally scratches the paint on Lownote Jones'.

episodes.name: Hair Fracture
episodes.overview: When Poppy injures her hair and is told to stay in bed until she's recovered, Branch and Val team up to make sure Poppy follows the doctor's orders.

episodes.name: Palentine's Day
episodes.overview: On Palentine's Day, Trolls ask each other to go with them to a party with big, elaborate, Pal-posals.

episodes.name: The Party Pooper
episodes.overview: Party-saving duo Guy and Meadow encounter a mysterious new Troll who starts ending parties early.

episodes.name: My Dinner with Dante
episodes.overview: When Dante Crescendo opens a fancy new restaurant and introduces TrollsTopia to fine classical dining, Holly Darlin isn't very enthused.

episodes.name: Hairicane
episodes.overview: Holly teams up with Poppy and R&B to discover what really happens to one's hair while inside the eye of a hair-i-cane.

episodes.name: Piney & Lord Prickles
episodes.overview: When Val loses her beloved snuggle toy, Piney, Poppy goes to incredible lengths to help her friend.

episodes.name: Potluck Poppy
episodes.overview: Poppy throws a TrollsTopia potluck to encourage Trolls to explore other tribe’s culinary delights.

episodes.name: Blaze and the Blazing Blazes
episodes.overview: When Blaze Powerchord's old bandmates come to town, Poppy and Minuet pretend to be his new bandmates.

episodes.name: Clash of the Battle Piñatas
episodes.overview: Branch is the champion of an event where Trolls design piñatas and smash them to see who reigns supreme, but he struggles to balance his need to win while being a good teammate.

episodes.name: R&B in R&D
episodes.overview: R&B get jobs in the Funtime Factory Research and Development division.

episodes.name: Disgruntle Weeds
episodes.overview: Val's complaints attract a herd of Disgruntle Weeds and she works with Holly Darlin' and Poppy to round them up.

episodes.name: Extreme Sleepover Club: Spooky Edition!
episodes.overview: The Extreme Sleepover Club welcomes new members Dante and Demo by having their first sleepover in the abandoned hairpod of Raisin Ruby.

episodes.name: Surprise-O-Tron
episodes.overview: Val teams up with Holly Darlin' and Smidge to win enough tickets in the Fun Dungeon to claim a prize for Poppy.

episodes.name: Dante the Entertainer
episodes.overview: When Dante draws the Balloon Sword from the Stone, he learns that he's destined to become the greatest children's entertainer.

episodes.name: Surprising Gust
episodes.overview: When Poppy learns that Gust's powers of observation have prevented him from ever having a surprise party, she decides to catch him off guard and throw him one.

episodes.name: Daylight Ravings Time
episodes.overview: Laguna is chosen to host a rave and turns to DJ Suki and Poppy to help her.

episodes.name: Nowhere to Fun, Nowhere to Hide
episodes.overview: When Poppy is the last Troll left in a game of hide-and-seek, Branch will stop at nothing to find her.

episodes.name: The Joy Chord
episodes.overview: Dante meets his hero, BeeTrollven, but has a hard time understanding the differences between the Troll he imagined and the Troll before him.

episodes.name: Wormhole Scavenger Hunt
episodes.overview: Poppy and friends participate in a scavenger hunt where the items on the list can only be found in other dimensions. But things get complicated when alternate reality versions of the Trolls show up to join in the game and challenge our heroes.

episodes.name: The Fabyrinth
episodes.overview: When Branch gets lost in a fabulous maze of his own making, Poppy, Val and Holly Darlin' must work together to find him and help him escape.

episodes.name: Dance Plants
episodes.overview: When the TrollsTopians start their first community garden, each tribe is excited to have their own unique plants growing side by side in horticultural harmony.

episodes.name: Mini Mini Golf
episodes.overview: R&B invent a machine that shrinks you down to play a tiny mini golf course.

episodes.name: Trollection
episodes.overview: The Trolls have their first election between Holly Darlin’ and Biggie to decide who should be Secretary of Skate.

episodes.name: Bro, Team! Bro!
episodes.overview: When Synth breaks out his pom-poms and takes to the sidelines, he is the greatest cheerleader TrollsTopia has ever seen!

episodes.name: Domin-Uh-Ohs
episodes.overview: When the Trolls set up the longest line of dominoes ever, Laguna goes to great lengths to ensure she doesn’t accidentally knock them over.

episodes.name: The Bunker Sitter
episodes.overview: Branch needs help taking care of his bunker, his friends try to prove to him that they're up for the job!

episodes.name: Shiny Diamond
episodes.overview: When Tiny Diamond introduces Poppy to his new invisible best friend ‘Shiny Diamond’, Poppy does everything in her power to keep the fantasy alive for Tiny.

episodes.name: Flyer's Ed
episodes.overview: Lownote Jones teaches a class on how to fly the funk spaceship.

episodes.name: Puffalo Express
episodes.overview: Poppy entrusts the Country Tribe’s Puffalo Express to deliver invitations for a Lownote Jones Surprise Party.

episodes.name: Merry Cloudmas
episodes.overview: Brimming with Cloudmas holiday spirit, Cloud Guy asks Poppy, Val and Holly to help him do something genuinely nice for Branch.

episodes.name: Don't Make Me Laugh!
episodes.overview: Cooper enters a hilarious contest where Trolls try to make each other laugh without laughing back.

episodes.name: Hair-aldine: The Musical
episodes.overview: When Holly Darlin’ writes and directs a musical that showcases the life of her role model, she has an epiphany that Val would be the perfect.

episodes.name: Trollvial Pursuit
episodes.overview: When a trivia game reveals that Poppy doesn't know as much about the Hard Rock tribe as she thought, Poppy decides to live amongst them.

episodes.name: Life of Pie
episodes.overview: Holly Darlin' learns that Branch is a baking savant and trains him to become TrollsTopia's greatest pie maker.

episodes.name: Big Brother Dante
episodes.overview: Dante becomes worried he and his brother are growing apart.

episodes.name: Art Breaker
episodes.overview: Poppy recreates one of Synth's paintings after accidentally destroying the original.

episodes.name: The Fun Harvest
episodes.overview: Holly Darlin' proves to Sky Toronto that game pieces are better when they're grown on a farm the old-fashioned way.

episodes.name: The Tunnel of Friendship
episodes.overview: Synth is deeply honoured when Minuet asks if he will commemorate their friendship with a ride down the Tunnel of Friendship.

episodes.name: BPF
episodes.overview: Poppy is determined to meet a cuddly pal on her own but realizes finding your pet soul mate may be tougher than she thought.

episodes.name: Follicle Fitness
episodes.overview: When Holly Darlin' discovers she has unhealthy hair, she enlists Smidge and Synth to help her whip her hair into shape.

episodes.name: The Not So Good Sport
episodes.overview: A K-Pop girl group comes into town looking for a Troll who has been labelled a "Not-So-Good Sport"

episodes.name: Bygone Bergen
episodes.overview: Holly Darlin' and Val encounter a Bergen for the first time and Poppy makes it her mission to prove that the Bergen is a gentle giant.

episodes.name: Stop the Presses
episodes.overview: Poppy tries to keep one of her biggest secrets from being discovered by TrollsTopia's best news reporter, Laguna Tidepool.

episodes.name: R&B Are on It!
episodes.overview: Rhythm & Blues host a "hair-podcast" that offers advice to Trolls in need.

episodes.name: To Hug a Snug-a-Lug
episodes.overview: Lownote Jones faces his old nemesis, Dr. Ravenhug, who has arrived in TrollsTopia convinced he can hug a snug-a-lug without consequence.

episodes.name: The Search for Piece
episodes.overview: Branch hosts a game night, and the Trolls build a puzzle.

episodes.name: Bubbled In
episodes.overview: When a bubble storm forces all of TrollsTopia to stay sheltered inside all day, we follow three sets of Trolls and explore how each decides to pass the time.

episodes.name: Fastest Draw in the West
episodes.overview: Holly and Minuet Sonata team up for a Guess and Draw tournament.

episodes.name: The Cloudback Whale
episodes.overview: Poppy shoots off a firework and unintentionally offends a Cloudback Whale, an enormous creature that swims through the clouds.

episodes.name: Truffle Trouble
episodes.overview: Holly Darlin’ doesn't think Pigtail, her beloved pig critter pet, is ready to go out in the woods.

episodes.name: Big Sis B
episodes.overview: Rhythm & Blues accidentally de-age R back to her childhood self with one of their inventions.

episodes.name: Journey to the Center of TrollsTopia
episodes.overview: When an underground river of lava threatens all of Rock Hollow, Poppy leads the Hard Rock Trolls deep under the earth to save the day.

episodes.name: Race to the Crest
episodes.overview: When gum gets Dante's wings stuck together, he and Val try to use other means of transportation to reach Classical Crest.

episodes.name: What’s in a Nickname?
episodes.overview: Branch finds out that Lownote Jones gives out nicknames that actually stick and manipulates him into giving him a nickname.

episodes.name: Ready, Set, Calendar!
episodes.overview: Poppy asks Holly Darlin' and Guy Diamond to take pictures for the first ever TrollsTopia calendar.

episodes.name: The Party Switcheroo
episodes.overview: When Val and Smidge stumble upon the fun children's table at one of Dante's formal parties, they discover a way to enjoy both parties by trading places.

episodes.name: Keep It Up
episodes.overview: Everyone in TrollsTopia is having the time of their lives batting a balloon around.

episodes.name: Be My Val in Time
episodes.overview: All the Trolls are excited that the plants that Poppy gifted them on their first day in TrollsTopia have finally bloomed-- except Val.

episodes.name: A Life Less Score-dinary
episodes.overview: Poppy attempts to make life in TrollsTopia more exciting by adding intense soundtrack and narration.

episodes.name: The Trolls-a-Thon
episodes.overview: Synth and Smidge discover that training Minuet Sonata for the big race is going to be harder than they thought because she never learned how to walk.

episodes.name: Air Apparent
episodes.overview: When Cloud Guy gets accepted to Cloud College, he sets out to find a suitable replacement to continue annoying Branch in his absence.

episodes.name: Under New Management
episodes.overview: Feeling a little smothered by Demo's managerial style, Val decides to find another manager that better suits her needs.

episodes.name: Give Me a Break
episodes.overview: When Poppy and Synth see that Minuet Sonata is running herself ragged trying to perfect her violin playing for an audition they try to convince her to take a break.

episodes.name: Once Bitten, Twice Guy
episodes.overview: Guy is preparing for his speech at the big Glitter Gala when he is bitten by a bat.

episodes.name: The Troublesome Trio
episodes.overview: Chaz the Smooth Jazz Troll, Marshtato Mary, and Pushy Poppy band together so they can take over TrollsTopia.

episodes.name: Hide & Go Hug
episodes.overview: With the rest of the Trolls hidden away playing a game, Synth, Demo and DJ are the only Trolls around to take on a pesky invasion.

episodes.name: Funder Construction
episodes.overview: When Tiny discovers he comes from a long line of expert blanket fort builders, he sets out to build a blanket structure worthy of his family’s legacy.

episodes.name: The Tech-less Breakfast
episodes.overview: R&B have promised to do all the cooking for the upcoming Pancake Breakfast.

episodes.name: The Farmer and the Hound
episodes.overview: When Biggie starts reading the saddest scrapbook in Country Western history, Poppy and Holly do everything they can to prevent him from making it to the super sad ending.

episodes.name: Val Serves Murray Duty
episodes.overview: Val has to fulfill her civic duty by dressing up as Murray the Puffalo.

episodes.name: Gal Pal Getawaycation
episodes.overview: Val has gone out of her way to plan a vacation with Poppy and Holly, but the quaint little cabin in the woods turns out to be a disaster.

episodes.name: Troll Exchange Program
episodes.overview: King Trollex has invited one TrollsTopian to come back and live with the Techno Tribe.
